member.name: T:CoinSpotDotNet.ServiceCollectionExtensions
member.summary: Contains helper methods to register CoinSpotDotNet services for .NET Dependency Injection

member.name: M:CoinSpotDotNet.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddCoinSpotV1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary:
Registers CoinSpot API v1 Services in the DI Container.
CoinSpotDotNet expects your API credentials to be available in the object under a section named either "CoinSpot" or "CoinSpotSettings" (case-insensitive). This section will then register an object using services.Configure<CoinSpotSettings>(IConfigurationSection) and utilised by the when making requests against the API
This method registers the following typed instances in the container using services.AddHttpClient<ICoinSpotClient, CoinSpotClient>:
member.param: The into which the services will be registered
member.returns: The to enable consumers to add Policy Handlers if required

member.name: M:CoinSpotDotNet.ServiceCollectionExtensions.AddCoinSpotV2(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary:
Registers CoinSpot API v2 Services in the DI Container.
CoinSpotDotNet expects your API credentials to be available in the object under a section named either "CoinSpot" or "CoinSpotSettings" (case-insensitive). This section will then register an object using services.Configure<CoinSpotSettings>(IConfigurationSection) and utilised by the when making requests against the API
This method registers the following typed instances in the container using services.AddHttpClient<ICoinSpotClient, CoinSpotClient>:
member.param: The into which the services will be registered
member.returns: The to enable consumers to add Policy Handlers if required
